overview: A radical reworking of an etching by the Italian artist Giorgio Morandi, brought to life by engraving frame by frame directly into the photographic emulsion of colour filmstock. The viewer is taken on a journey through the etching, accompanied by the sounds that the artist might have heard from his window as he worked. Scratched onto 8 perf 35mm colour filmstock and printed as negative.
title: Still Life with Small Cup
